# removeMfa

Disables (removes) existing MFA factors by ID or factor type.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`DisableMfaParams`
The parameters specifying which factors to disable

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
A promise that resolves when the factors are disabled
